message.content:
cs.CR, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.SE, cs.SI 

This paper is primarily focused on malware detection, which falls under the category of computer security (cs.CR). The use of reinforcement learning (RL) to dynamically assign detection tools and set detection thresholds is a form of artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The paper also discusses the effectiveness and robustness of their approach, which involves evaluating different organizational policies, indicating a focus on machine learning (cs.LG) and software engineering (cs.SE). Finally, the paper addresses the need to enforce a predefined security policy that comports with the needs of each organization, which could fall under the category of social and information networks (cs.SI).
